00046 #include <QModelIndex>
00047 #include <QString>
00048 
00049 #include <Inventor/SbName.h>
00050 #include <Inventor/nodes/SoNode.h>
00051 
00052 #include "CmdChangeNodeName.h"
00053 #include "InstanceNode.h"
00054 #include "SceneModel.h"
00055 #include "tgf.h"
00056 
00060 CmdChangeNodeName::CmdChangeNodeName( const QModelIndex& index, QString newName, SceneModel* model, QUndoCommand* parent )
00061 : QUndoCommand("Change node name", parent), m_newName ( newName ), m_previousName( "" ), m_pNode( 0 ), m_pModel( model )
00062 {
00063         if( !index.isValid() ) tgf::SevereError( "CmdChangeNodeName called with invalid ModelIndex." );
00064         InstanceNode* selectedNodeInstance = m_pModel->NodeFromIndex( index );
00065         if( !selectedNodeInstance ) tgf::SevereError( "CmdChangeNodeName called with invalid node." );
00066         m_pNode = selectedNodeInstance->GetNode();
00067 
00068         m_previousName = QString( m_pNode->getName().getString() );
00069 
00070 }
00071 
00075 CmdChangeNodeName::~CmdChangeNodeName()
00076 {
00077 }
00078 
00082 void CmdChangeNodeName::undo()
00083 {
00084         m_pModel->SetNodeName( m_pNode, m_previousName );
00085 }
00086 
00090 void CmdChangeNodeName::redo()
00091 {
00092         m_pModel->SetNodeName( m_pNode, m_newName );
00093 }
